description: React component for displaying an estate overview dashboard with metrics, refresh functionality, and error handling.

methods.name: MetricCard
methods.description: A React component that displays a metric with label, value, optional subtext, and accent color.

methods.name: Section
methods.description: A React component that renders a section with a title and grid layout for child components.

methods.name: EstateOverview
methods.description: Main React component that fetches estate health data and displays various metrics and sections.
